data.title: Adam Kaufman Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Adam Kaufman on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Adam Kaufman including Loving Leah, Is This A Joke?, and more.
data.text:
Wrong is Right

A rocket scientist with strong ties to government security is found dead with his crotch on fire, and the S.V.U. Detectives must determine if that had something to do with his demise.

Unanswered Prayers

As Daleâs secretive behavior leads Lacey (Rebecca Field) to suspect heâs having an affair, Riley (Jennifer Love Hewitt) presses Kyle to cooperate in a police investigation, even though it could put their family in danger.

Guilty Pleasure

The death of a Navy officer leads Gibbs and the team into the world of high-priced call girls, relying on D.C. Madam Holly Snow to help them catch a killer.

The Girl Next Door

Veronica becomes suspicious when her pregnant upstairs neighbor suddenly goes missing, prompting both Keith and Veronica to investigate the girl's disappearance. Veronica is also shocked to learn that her mother and Duncan's father were high school sweethearts. Meanwhile, it appears that Weevil and the late Lilly Kane once had a romantic relationship.
